system.name: MVP Web API
system.overview: Single-account MVP with serverless web and API, optimized for speed and low ops.

assumptions.statement: Initial workload runs in a single AWS account.
Traffic is modest and bursty; serverless is acceptable.

decisions.title: Network architecture
decisions.decision: Serverless-first with no VPC unless required for data services.

decisions.title: Security baseline
decisions.decision: Enable CloudTrail, Config, Security Hub, GuardDuty; enforce least privilege.
